at.ac.tuwien.mmue_lm7.utils

Class ObjectPool<T extends ObjectPool.Poolable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.mmue_lm7.utils.ObjectPool<T>

  • public class ObjectPool<T extends ObjectPool.Poolable>
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to reuse objects, prevent too many instantiations inspired from libgdx object pool (https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/wiki/Memory-management)
    Author:
    simon

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ObjectPool.Poolable
      Must be implemented by a class to be reuseable by an object pool

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayDeque<T> freeObjects 
      private Supplier<T> supplier
      used to generate a new instance of T, if there are no free objects

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ObjectPool(Supplier<T> supplier) 
      ObjectPool(Supplier<T> supplier, int initialSize) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void free(T t)
      Frees given object, calls reset on given object, can be obtained later
      void freeAll(java.util.Collection<T> objects)
      Frees all given objects, calls reset on every object
      T obtain()
      instantiates a new object if there is no free object

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
